settings.content: Built for Intense Workouts—Commercial Quality at Home

settings.f_content:
• Built for Intensity: Heavy-duty steel frame with a matte finish for lasting durability.
  • Unmatched Stability: Supports 1200 lbs with dual back supports for superior security.
  • Quick Adjustments: Fast, secure, and smooth adjustments for a variety of exercises.
  • Long-Lasting Comfort: Thick padding and premium PU leather for ultimate support.
  • Effortless Setup: Easy 5-minute assembly with wheels for hassle-free mobility.

In-stock orders are processed within 24 hours, with delivery typically taking 3-7 business days. Please note, we do not accept returns but offer replacements for defective products.

Click here to view more details.

Liberty insurance coverage

We are partnered up with Liberty Insurance to cover injuries due to product faults or misfunctions during your training up to 4 million dollars (Coverage is limited to dumbbell products purchased from Ativafit website)
Please follow the instructions to assemble it.
Mainframe x1, Seat cushion x1, Backrest cushion x1, Support tube x1, Tool kit x1, Instruction manual x1

settings.heading: Strength. Flexibility. Endurance. All in one.
settings.context: - The ultimate home gym in a box.

settings.title: Length:
settings.slidetext: 50 inches

settings.title: Width:
settings.slidetext: 13 inches

settings.title: Height:
settings.slidetext: 17.7 inches
Supports up to 1200 lbs. Dual back supports and long base contact points enhance stability, offering more security than pin adjustments.
Made with heavy-duty 3.2*1.6 tubular steel and 0.2 iron sheet, this bench is built for intense workouts. Its matte finish prevents paint peeling, ensuring lasting durability.
C-shaped lock catch allows for fast, secure adjustments. 7 backrest and 3 seat positions support a variety of exercises.
2.5" thick padding and durable PU leather for lasting comfort. 17.7" height and 34" backrest fit a wide range of users. Adjustable foot caps ensure stability and balance.
Includes all parts and tools for quick setup, plus 2 wheels for easy transport within your home gym.

settings.heading: Flex Your Fitness: Anywhere, Anytime
settings.subheading: The Home Gym That Keeps You Moving
settings.scene_text_01: The 66lb dumbbells are heavy enough to challenge even the most experienced lifters. They're perfect for compound exercises like squats, deadlifts, and bench presses, which work multiple muscle groups at once.
settings.scene_text_02: The adjustable weight range allows you to target specific muscle groups with isolation exercises like bicep curls, tricep extensions, and shoulder raises.
settings.scene_text_03: 66lb dumbbells can be used to perform functional exercises like dumbbell swings, clean and presses, and box jumps. These exercises are great for improving your overall fitness and athleticism.
settings.scene_text_04: The 66lb dumbbells can be used to add intensity to your cardio workouts. Try doing dumbbell swings, cleans, or presses for intervals to burn calories and improve your cardiovascular health.
settings.scene_text_05: High-intensity interval training (HIIT) is a great way to burn fat and improve your fitness. The 66lb dumbbells can be used to perform HIIT exercises like dumbbell burpees, snatches, or jerk.

settings.question: What is the weight capacity of the Pro Adjustable Weight Bench?
settings.answer: The Pro Adjustable Weight Bench has a maximum weight capacity of 1200 lbs, making it suitable for a wide range of users and exercises, including heavy strength training.

settings.question: Is the bench compatible with the Ativafit 66lbs and 88lbs adjustable dumbbells?
settings.answer: Yes, it is perfectly compatible with both the Ativafit 66lbs and 88lbs adjustable dumbbells. The bench has a sturdy frame and wide platform to provide support for a variety of exercises when used with these dumbbells.

settings.question: What are the adjustment settings on the Pro Adjustable Weight Bench?
settings.answer: The bench offers 7 backrest and 3 seat adjustments, allowing for flat, incline, and decline positions. The adjustable settings help you target different muscle groups and optimize your workout routine.

settings.question: Can I use the bench for a variety of exercises?
settings.answer: Yes, the Pro Adjustable Weight Bench is designed to accommodate a variety of exercises, including bench presses, dumbbell rows, incline flys, and chest presses. The versatile design makes it a great addition to any home gym.

settings.question: How do I adjust the bench?
settings.answer: To adjust the bench, simply lift the backrest cushion or seat cushion and position it to your desired angle. The cushion will automatically catch onto the C-shaped lock, securing it in place. No tools are needed for adjustment.

settings.question: Is the bench easy to assemble?
settings.answer: Yes, the bench comes with an easy-to-follow assembly manual and all the necessary tools for quick setup. Most users can assemble the bench in 5-10 minutes.

settings.question: Is the bench suitable for users of all fitness levels?
settings.answer: Yes, the Pro Adjustable Weight Bench is suitable for all fitness levels. However, if you have advanced training needs or plan to train with heavier weights, we recommend this Pro Weight Bench for its higher weight capacity. If you're a fitness enthusiast or beginner working out with lighter weights, you may want to check out our Upgraded Home Workout Bench, which is high-quality, foldable, and designed to save space.

settings.question: How do I maintain the bench to keep it in good condition?
settings.answer: To maintain your Pro Adjustable Weight Bench, simply wipe it down with a soft cloth after each use. Avoid using harsh chemicals that could damage the surface. Check the adjustment mechanism regularly to ensure everything is secure.

settings.question: Is the bench covered by a warranty?
settings.answer: Yes, the Pro Adjustable Weight Bench is backed by a 1-year warranty that covers manufacturing defects. If you experience any issues with the product, please reach out to our customer support team at services@ativafit.com for assistance.

settings.heading: Ativafit Personalized Plan Quick Registration
settings.text: Welcome to the first step in your Ativafit personalized journey! By providing some basic information, you're on your way to getting a fitness and nutrition plan tailored just for you. Please fill out this quick registration form, and our team will be in touch to dive deeper into your lifestyle and workout habits, ensuring a detailed and specific plan is crafted to meet your needs.
